job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of predictive models for ad suitability, which falls under the core task of creating and adapting machine learning models.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions predictive models for identifying likely converters/clickers, a clear example of traditional ML model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of predictive models for user attribute prediction based on content consumption, fitting the definition of traditional ML model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This task involves data processing and management within a big data environment, which aligns with data engineering and management for ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: Building data pipelines for monitoring and alerting is a key aspect of data engineering and management in an ML context.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt mee aan onze web applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in building web applications, a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, â€¦)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to DevOps practices, including infra-as-code and CI/CD, which are central to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end process of model development, from analysis and experimentation to implementation and presentation.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: Building data stacks and pipelines is a core data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions building an ML Ops platform, which falls under MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: Integrating services with other teams is a software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: Presenting results to business teams indicates an understanding of business needs and communication of technical outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: 20% van de tijd werken aan features en modellen, 80% is bouwen aan de data stack, web applicaties & incrementele verbeteringen
job_tasks.justification: While this describes time allocation, the focus on building data stacks and web applications implies a strong business alignment with product development.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
soft_skills.justification: Participation in scrum ceremonies indicates collaboration and communication within a team.

soft_skills.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
soft_skills.justification: Presenting results to both dev and business teams requires strong communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit
soft_skills.justification: The 'build it, run it' mentality signifies ownership and responsibility for the developed systems.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
soft_skills.justification: Directly states taking ownership and accountability, which aligns with this category.
Experimenting with different models implies a willingness to explore and learn new approaches.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional ML tasks such as building predictive models for advertising, audience segmentation, and user attribute prediction. While there are software engineering and MLOps components (building web apps, data pipelines, CI/CD, ML Ops platform), the core of the role is centered around traditional ML model development and data engineering. There is no mention of Generative AI specific tasks like LLMs, RAG, or prompt engineering. Therefore, 'Core ML Engineer' is the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job description is very clear about the tasks involved, explicitly mentioning the types of predictive models to be built and the technologies used. The distinction between traditional ML and GenAI is clear, and the role's focus is unambiguously on traditional ML. The language is direct and provides sufficient detail for confident classification.
